channel.title: art on melekes.me
channel.description: Recent content in art on melekes.me

item.title: Monthly Art #52
item.description:
This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

I know it’s been a long time, but this year is absolutely nuts. I’m going to write a separate post with my thoughts.

This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

#CyberpunkisNow The model in the center (Imma) is CGI - 100% computer rendered Instagram model Imma has 50K+ followers & models for Kate Cosmetics.

Sequoia Capital has invested millions in Brud, the company behind CGI rendered Instagram model Lil Miquela (1.5 million followers). pic.twitter.com/4xZpK6nULZ

— ΜΔDΞRΔS (@hackermaderas) May 27, 2019

item.title: Monthly Art #36
item.description:
This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

For my birthday this year, I did a 10-day silent vipassana meditation, this time in Pyin Oo Lwin, Myanmar 🇲🇲. We went into silence on the night of my birthday, the 19th. Here’s what I know 👇🏼

— jack (@jack) December 9, 2018

item.title: Route in Ecuador
item.description:
(image credit: https://www.flickr.com/photos/wurglitsch/9466325427)

This route was suggested to me by girl from Ecuador (thanks Carla), whom I met in Mexico on Dec. 10, 2017.
